description:
This template posts each new opportunity you receive on Sortlist into a Slack channel of your choice.
It helps your team stay informed and never miss important business opportunities.
When you enable the scenario, you will simply connect your Sortlist and Slack accounts and select the channel where messages should be sent.
This template works out-of-the-box and requires no technical knowledge.
